snippet.title: The Space Brigade: Space Raiders Refueled. Now Available on Itch!
snippet.description:
Unveil the cosmic battle in The Space Brigade: Space Raiders - Refueled! This beloved game, originally developed by Muruigames, returns with engaging gameplay and charming pixel art graphics. NFI presents an enhanced version with exciting improvements for fans.

Protect the transport ship and survive by recovering vital supplies in this faithful remaster. Skillfully eliminate asteroids and collect fuel and medkits/repair kits. NFI pays tribute to the original game, preserving its core gameplay throughout.

Experience the enhanced edition with higher resolution graphics that immerse you in intense cosmic battles. Navigate with precision using intuitive touch controls. Feel the thrill with subtle vibrations. Enjoy a new musical score and improved graphics that breathe new life into the charming pixel art.

Join the cosmic battle and embark on a remastered adventure in "The Space Brigade: Space Raiders - Refueled"!

Download the game now!
https://northforest.itch.io/spaceraiders
